posts.post_content:
stygimoloch there are SO many kinds of swords. a scimitar is actually very deadly, since its moonlike shape make it sharper for slashing people. weapons like this are one of the reasons the muslims defeated the crusaders. a scimitar is also much quicker than an axe or hammer and can be used on horseback. true, medieval western swords were heavy, clumsy and innaccurate, but scimitars and katanas are far deadlier.  
  
i dont really like the card. i can get a 5/5 flyer with firebreath for just 2 more. unless its a [shivan dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=shivan dragon), that ill never play since i hate the fact its rare.
